body:
Day 49 - 1186*
Meh, pretty good but they should have been published separately.
4/10.

Addendum: The story about "Disgraced" is really good as I personaly dispite woman who archiev everything just with sexual favours while acting all dignified, moral and mighty. Saw that way to often during my academic days. Still the best story by far is "M". What sweet suffering, especially her flashback.

Hentai lesson 1: All men are evil. / Hentai lesson 2: All men are crazy rapist. / Hentai lesson 3: All women are completely help- and defenceless. Conclusion: excellent filthy, disgusting, putrid japanese misery porn. Kudos to the artist, as he draws some of the best after-rape, cum-covered, traumatized-stare female-victim-internally-dead-like-a-squashed-cockroach pictures I ever saw in the hentai genre.
Yoooo. i love the D.I.D part
Oh yes this frist time i saying :" like n dislike :'/ '
